snippet: Jordan Cardenas homered and pitched two and a third innings of hitless relief, and San Antonio, Tex., took advantage of defensive miscues to beat Parsippany, N.J. Vancouver, British Columbia, beat Nuevo Laredo, Mexico.
abstract: San Antonio, Vancouver, New Castle, Ind, and Panama are winners in elimination rounds at the Little League World Series.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Cardenas homered and pitched two and a third innings of hitless relief, and San Antonio, Tex., took advantage of defensive miscues to beat Parsippany, N.J. Vancouver, British Columbia, beat Nuevo Laredo, Mexico.

headline.seo: In Little League World Series, New Jersey Loses and Vancouver Wins
headline.main: In Little League World Series, New Jersey Loses and Vancouver Advances
